author: mrodozov
body:
#### PR description:

Fix at least one problem in AMPTHadronizer, see 
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33452 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33682
I'd like to test against ARM IB to check wf 280.0

#### PR validation:

None, this is simple enough to work
title: Use .length instead of strlen() in AMPTHadronizer
